title: PeerChat Lite: Secure Peer-to-Peer Messaging Application
projectDescription: PeerChat Lite is a practice project designed to explore the development of a secure, peer-to-peer messaging application using React Native and Firestore. This innovative app focuses on privacy and security by ensuring that messages are stored on the user's device and are not retained in the database once delivered. PeerChat Lite offers a real-time communication platform that prioritizes user confidentiality and data integrity.

desc: Built with React Native, PeerChat Lite operates seamlessly across both iOS and Android devices, providing a consistent and smooth user experience regardless of the platform.
Utilizing Firestore's real-time capabilities, PeerChat Lite enables instant message delivery and updates. Users can see messages as they are sent, ensuring immediate and efficient communication.

PeerChat Lite features an intuitive and responsive user interface, designed to facilitate easy navigation and interaction. Users can quickly access their chat lists, send messages, and manage conversations with minimal effort.

Messages are stored locally on the user's device, ensuring that once they are delivered, they are not retained in the Firestore database. This approach enhances privacy and reduces the risk of unauthorized data access.

PeerChat Lite employs a robust authentication mechanism using valid contact numbers. Users register with their phone numbers, ensuring that only authorized users can access the platform and participate in conversations.
Firestore is used for real-time message delivery and user authentication. However, once messages are delivered, they are removed from the database to maintain user privacy.

PeerChat Lite offers offline messaging capabilities, allowing users to compose and queue messages even without an internet connection. Once connectivity is restored, the messages are automatically delivered.

By storing messages locally and removing them from the Firestore database after delivery, PeerChat Lite minimizes data exposure and enhances user privacy. This approach aligns with best practices for data security and user confidentiality.

desc1: Provides a secure and private platform for instant communication, with a focus on data privacy.
Enhances the messaging experience with real-time updates and media sharing, while ensuring messages are not stored in the cloud.
Ensures that messages are only accessible on the user's device, reducing the risk of data breaches and unauthorized access.
Local storage to maintain the confidentiality and integrity of conversations.
Provides a practical example of implementing end-to-end encryption and local data storage in a real-time messaging application.

footNote: PeerChat Lite aims to deliver a secure and efficient messaging experience by prioritizing user privacy and data security. This practice project showcases the potential of React Native and Firestore in building real-time applications.
